Class LibraryItemRepository

java.lang.Object
com.lms.library.repository.LibraryItemRepository
@Repository public class LibraryItemRepository extends Object
Repository class for managing LibraryItem entities. Provides data access operations for books and journals using an in-memory store.
Since:
2025
Version:
1.0
Author:
Joel Silva
See Also:
  • LibraryItem
  • Book
  • Journal

  • Constructor Details

    • LibraryItemRepository

      public LibraryItemRepository()
      Default constructor for LibraryItemRepository.

  • Method Details

    • init

      @PostConstruct public void init()
      Initializes the repository with sample data. Called automatically after dependency injection is complete.

    • save

      public LibraryItem save(LibraryItem item)
      Saves a library item to the repository. If the item has no ID, generates a new one automatically.
      Parameters:
      item - the library item to save
      Returns:
      the saved library item with generated ID

    • findById

      public Optional<LibraryItem> findById(Long id)
      Finds a library item by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the item to find
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found item, or empty if not found

    • findAvailableItemById

      public Optional<LibraryItem> findAvailableItemById(Long id)
      Finds an available library item by its ID. Only returns items that are currently available for loan.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the item to find
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the available item, or empty if not found or unavailable

    • findAvailableItems

      public List<LibraryItem> findAvailableItems()
      Finds all available library items.
      Returns:
      a list of all available library items

    • findByTitleContainingIgnoreCase

      public List<LibraryItem> findByTitleContainingIgnoreCase(String title)
      Finds library items by title (case-insensitive partial match).
      Parameters:
      title - the title or partial title to search for
      Returns:
      a list of items whose titles contain the search string

    • findAvailableBooks

      public List<LibraryItem> findAvailableBooks()
      Finds all available books.
      Returns:
      a list of all available Book instances

    • findAvailableJournals

      public List<LibraryItem> findAvailableJournals()
      Finds all available journals.
      Returns:
      a list of all available Journal instances
